Sentencas: We propose a simple ink formulation and a rapid preparation technique to deposit a 20 mol% gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte utilizing nanopowders and a polymeric dispersant.
Titulo: Ink formulation and printing of electrolyte for a doped ceria solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The ink was assessed for printability and was successfully printed using a piezoelectric inkjet materials printer.
Titulo: Ink formulation and printing of electrolyte for a doped ceria solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The ejected drops were investigated using built-in stroboscopic imaging during ejection, and the deposited thin films were characterised using optical microscopy and surface profilometry.
Titulo: Ink formulation and printing of electrolyte for a doped ceria solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Inkjet material deposition provides a highly repeatable process for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) that can be up-scaled to industrial levels.
Titulo: Ink formulation and printing of electrolyte for a doped ceria solid oxide fuel cell
